articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Soccer-Watford out of bottom three after win at Bournemouth
articles.description: Watford moved out of the relegation zone as their stunning revival under new manager Nigel Pearson continued with a 3-0 victory at south coast strugglers Bournemouth on Sunday.
articles.content:
BOURNEMOUTH, England, Jan 12 (Reuters) - Watford moved out of the relegation zone as their stunning revival under new manager Nigel Pearson continued with a 3-0 victory at south coast strugglers Bournemouth on Sunday.

articles.title: Federer responds to Thunberg's 'wake-up' volley
articles.description: Roger Federer has responded to criticism from teenaged climate change activist Greta Thunberg, saying he is "happy to be reminded" of his responsibilities.
articles.content:

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Barca striker Suarez out for four months after knee surgery
articles.description: Barcelona striker Luis Suarez is set to miss the majority of the rest of the season after undergoing knee surgery, the Spanish champions said on Sunday in a huge blow to their hopes of winning the domestic title and Champions League.
articles.content:
BARCELONA (Reuters) - Barcelona striker Luis Suarez is set to miss the majority of the rest of the season after undergoing knee surgery, the Spanish champions said on Sunday in a huge blow to their hopes of winning the domestic title and Champions League.

articles.title: UK and Germany condemn arrest of Britain's Tehran ambassador - UK PM's office
articles.description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson and German Chancellor Angela Merkel condemned the arrest of Britain's ambassador to Tehran, a spokesman from Johnson's office said in a statement issued after the two leaders spoke on Sunday.
articles.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - British Prime Minister Boris Johnson and German Chancellor Angela Merkel condemned the arrest of Britain’s ambassador to Tehran, a spokesman from Johnson’s office said in a statement issued after the two leaders spoke on Sunday.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Top Iran security official says Tehran did not hide cause of Ukraine plane crash
articles.description: A senior Iranian security official said on Sunday Iran had no intention to conceal the cause of the crash of a Ukrainian airliner which the Iranian military admitted it had mistakenly shot down, the state-run IRIB news agency reported.
articles.content:
DUBAI (Reuters) - A senior Iranian security official said on Sunday Iran had no intention to conceal the cause of the crash of a Ukrainian airliner which the Iranian military admitted it had mistakenly shot down, the state-run IRIB news agency reported.

articles.author: Jonathan Barrett
articles.title: Djokovic leads Serbia to ATP Cup glory
articles.description: Novak Djokovic helped seal victory for Serbia in the inaugural ATP Cup team event after defeating his long-term Spanish rival Rafael Nadal in singles on Sunday before going on to play a pivotal role in the deciding doubles match.
articles.content:
SYDNEY (Reuters) - Novak Djokovic helped seal victory for Serbia in the inaugural ATP Cup team event after defeating his long-term Spanish rival Rafael Nadal in singles on Sunday before going on to play a pivotal role in the deciding doubles match.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Italy's Prysmian says Western Link submarine power cable currently unavailable
articles.description: The Western Link high-voltage submarine power cable between Scotland and England is currently unavailable after tripping on Friday, Italian cablemaker Prysmian, which built the link, said on Sunday.
articles.content:
MILAN (Reuters) - The Western Link high-voltage submarine power cable between Scotland and England is currently unavailable after tripping on Friday, Italian cablemaker Prysmian, which built the link, said on Sunday.

articles.title: Iran's only female Olympic medalist says she has defected
articles.description: Iran's only female Olympic medalist has said on social media she had left her homeland because she had had enough of being used by its authorities as a propaganda tool.
articles.content:

articles.author: Fayaz Bukhari
articles.title: Senior police officer arrested in Kashmir on suspicion of aiding militants
articles.description: A senior police officer has been arrested in Indian Kashmir and accused of aiding militants after he was found driving two suspected insurgents toward Jammu, Kashmir's chief of police told reporters on Sunday.
articles.content:
SRINAGAR (Reuters) - A senior police officer has been arrested in Indian Kashmir and accused of aiding militants after he was found driving two suspected insurgents toward Jammu, Kashmir’s chief of police told reporters on Sunday.
